attributes.action: Allow free trade and immigration between UK, Canada,Australia and New Zealand.
attributes.background: With Brexit and Trump, the UK's trade is now uncertain; closer trade with the commonwealth nations should be our next step. I've asked many Brexit voters on their opinion of free immigration between the UK, Canada, Australia and New Zealand, majority of which said they will support such policy.

rejection.details: The UK Government doesn't have the power to do this on its own. You could start a new petition asking the UK Government to enter into discussions with the governments of Canada, Australia and New Zealand to achieve this.
